name: Cup Game
body_text: Choose an opponent. Without looking at their cards, take a random card from the hand, the top card from the Library, and a random card from the [[Refuse]]. Place the cards facedown and shuffle them. That opponent chooses one of the cards (without looking at it) and puts it in their hand. The opponent then chooses another of the cards and puts it on the top of their Library. The remaining card goes into their Refuse.
